title: Is life with multiple monitors actually better?
description: I can only get work done if I'm being soothed by an hour-long video of an in-game rave from FF14 on my second monitor.

title: Before Doom, before Wolfenstein 3D, why does nobody remember one of the first first-person shooters?
description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

title: Aww: These dark fantasy warriors have the cutest widdle kitty faces
description: You just wanna pspspspsps at them.

title: Check out the grim vibes on this monochrome dungeon crawler
description: You can "get suplexed by an iron golem" in Demon Lord Reincarnation.

title: Elden Ring wins the Nebula award for Game Writing
description: Another award for the pile, ain't it?

title: 2023's best gaming soundtrack was co-created by a high school student and a first-time composer
description: Pizza Tower co-composer ClascyJitto had some frustrations with a music theory class, and jokingly mused that "it would be really funny to pull the 'do you know who I am?' card."

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #700: Saturday, May 20
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.
